content:
For those interested in the topic of genomics code systems, here's a link to a Google doc where details are being compiled:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14sIVVED2rI0Ab2ZQ3oV6v8njzX-sRezkIWcgkkepUUg/edit?usp=sharing

Some related Zulip threads:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179197-genomics/topic/Corrections.20of.20Terminology.20URIs.20in.20Core
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179197-genomics/topic/terminology.20to.20unified.20IG
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179197-genomics/topic/HGNC.20code
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179197-genomics/topic/CodeSystem.20URIs.20for.20genomics
